p: Conversely, the new model was re-run with the 2009 epidemics data. In this case, the predictive accuracy was high ( K = 0.71 at a cut off point of 0.35), however the fraction explained by the fixed factors was significantly reduced (marginal R 2 = 0.45), whereas the variance explained by the Province as a random grouping increased (conditional R 2 = 0.84).
